registry.description: Registry to use for the image. Example: https://hub.docker.com

namespace.description: Custom Namespace to use for the image name. Format of the final image name: https://hub.docker.com/${namespace}/${projectName}

tag.description: Tag to use for the image. Usually the tag generated by the `nx docker-release` command in the format '{projectName}@{version}'

push.description: Push the image to the registry. Default: true

platforms.description: Comma separated list of platforms to build for. Format: {os}/{architecture} (e.g. linux/amd64, windows/amd64, windows/arm64)
